insert into PD_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_MASTER (ID, SUBJECT, DAYS_FOR_CORRECT, DATE_FOR_CORRECTED, COMMENTS, ATTACHMENTS, TASK_ID, VERSION, CREATED_DTM, CREATED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DTM, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, DELETED) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daysForCorrect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateForCorrected,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastModifiedDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update PD_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_MASTER
SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAYS_FOR_CORRECT = #{daysForCorrect,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DATE_FOR_CORRECTED = #{dateForCorrected,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ATTACHMENTS = #{attachments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

LAST_MODIFIED_DTM = #{lastModifiedDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
